mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myclassmain (mym_no, mym_mid, mym_code, mym_title, mym_name, mym_period, mym_price, mym_sdate, mym_edate, mym_done, mym_yn) VALUES (myclassmain_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{cmCode}, #{cmTitle}, #{cmName}, #{cmPeriod}, #{cmPrice}, sysdate, ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, #{cmPeriod}), 'N', 'Y')

INSERT INTO myclasssub (mys_no, mys_mid, mys_code, mys_group, mys_title, mys_content, mys_video, mys_runtime, mys_watchtime, mys_sdate, mys_edate, mys_ddate, mys_done, mys_yn) VALUES (myclasssub_seq.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{csCode}, #{csGroup}, #{csTitle}, #{csContent}, #{csVideo}, #{csRuntime}, '0', sysdate, ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, #{period}), null,'N', 'Y')

mapper.update: UPDATE (SELECT * FROM myclassmain WHERE mym_mid = #{id} AND mym_yn = 'Y') SET mym_yn = 'N' WHERE mym_edate <= SYSTIMESTAMP
UPDATE (SELECT * FROM myclasssub WHERE mys_mid = #{id} AND mys_yn = 'Y') SET mys_yn = 'N' WHERE mys_edate <= SYSTIMESTAMP
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT num, mym_no, mym_mid, mym_code, mym_title, mym_name, mym_sdate, mym_edate, mym_done, mym_yn, video FROM (SELECT rownum num, mym_no, mym_mid, mym_code, mym_title, mym_name, mym_sdate, mym_edate, mym_done, mym_yn, video FROM myclassmain, (SELECT cs_group, cs_code, cs_video video FROM classsub) WHERE mym_mid = #{id} AND mym_yn = 'Y' AND cs_code = CONCAT(LOWER(mym_code),'_01')) WHERE mym_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR mym_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
